tools.name: contextcore.meta.artifact_type_registry
tools.description: Complete registry of all 19 artifact types across 4 categories (observability, onboarding, source, integrity)

tools.name: contextcore.insight.emit
tools.description:
Emit agent-generated insights as OTel spans for cross-agent collaboration


Avoid:
- Never emit insights without confidence scores—they're required for prioritization
- Don't use audience=agent for blockers humans need to see

applies_to.description: File paths or patterns this insight applies to

tools.name: contextcore.insight.query
tools.description: Query prior insights from Tempo by project, type, confidence, or file path

applies_to.description: Filter by file path or pattern

tools.name: contextcore.handoff.initiate
tools.description:
Start agent-to-agent task delegation with size constraints and expected output


Avoid:
- Don't set max_lines > 150 for LLM-generated code—truncation risk
- Always specify completeness_markers for code generation

status.description: Full A2A-aligned state machine with is_terminal(), is_active(), can_transition_to() helpers

tools.name: contextcore.handoff.receive
tools.description: Poll for and process incoming handoffs as receiving agent

timeout_s.description: Max time to poll before returning

tools.name: contextcore.guidance.read_constraints
tools.description:
Read human-defined constraints from ProjectContext CRD


Avoid:
- Never ignore BLOCKING constraints—they are mandatory

path.description: Optional file path to filter constraints

tools.name: contextcore.guidance.answer_question
tools.description: Answer open questions from humans with confidence and evidence

tools.name: contextcore.code_generation.contract
tools.description:
Define code generation contracts with size limits and completeness markers


Avoid:
- Never skip size estimation—truncated code is worse than no code
- Always specify required_exports for verification

tools.name: contextcore.size_estimation.estimate
tools.description: Estimate code output size before generation using heuristics

tools.name: contextcore.a2a.server
tools.description:
Expose ContextCore agent as A2A-compatible server with JSON-RPC and discovery


Avoid:
- Don't expose A2A server without authentication in production

tools.name: contextcore.a2a.client
tools.description: Communicate with remote A2A-compatible agents via JSON-RPC client

tools.name: contextcore.a2a.task_adapter
tools.description: Bidirectional translation between A2A Task JSON and ContextCore Handoff

inputSchema.description: Either a Handoff object or A2A Task dict

outputSchema.description: Converted object (A2A Task dict or ContextCore Handoff)

tools.name: contextcore.a2a.content_model
tools.description: Unified Part/Message/Artifact content model compatible with A2A message format

outputSchema.description: Part, Message, or Artifact instance with to_a2a_dict()

tools.name: contextcore.handoff.input_request
tools.description: Request additional input from delegating agent during handoff execution

question.description: Question to ask the delegating agent

tools.name: contextcore.api.unified
tools.description: Unified API facade with resource.action naming for insights, handoffs, and skills

tools.name: contextcore.manifest.load
tools.description:
Load and parse Context Manifest (v1.1 or v2) with automatic version detection


Avoid:
- Don't load manifest in hot paths—cache the parsed result
- Don't embed sensitive data in manifest—it's checked into Git
- Don't assume field names—grep model definition before instantiating

data.description: Dict representation of manifest (for programmatic use)

tools.name: contextcore.manifest.distill_crd
tools.description: Distill lightweight K8s ProjectContext CRD from full Context Manifest

tools.name: contextcore.manifest.validate
tools.description: Validate Context Manifest against schema with detailed error reporting

tools.name: contextcore.manifest.migrate
tools.description:
Migrate Context Manifest from v1.1 to v2 format non-destructively


Avoid:
- Don't modify v1 input in place without --in-place flag—migration returns new dict
- Don't skip validation—always parse output as ContextManifestV2

outputSchema.description: v2 manifest dict suitable for ContextManifestV2

tools.name: contextcore.manifest.guidance.read
tools.description:
Read agent guidance (constraints, focus, questions) from v2 manifest


Avoid:
- Never ignore BLOCKING constraints—they are mandatory
- Don't assume v1 manifests have guidance—check apiVersion first

tools.name: contextcore.manifest.sync_strategy
tools.description: [DEVELOPMENT - not yet implemented] Sync strategy/tactic status bidirectionally with project management tools

tools.name: contextcore.manifest.export_provenance
tools.description:
Export artifact manifest with comprehensive provenance audit trail


Avoid:
- Don't skip provenance for production exports—it's essential for debugging
- Don't rely on embedded provenance alone if auditors need separate files

tools.name: contextcore.manifest.init_bootstrap
tools.description:
Scaffold a new v2 context manifest with validated template and pipeline next steps


Avoid:
- Don't skip post-write validation—invalid templates indicate a bug

tools.name: contextcore.pipeline.check_pipeline
tools.description:
Run 7 integrity checks on export output before plan ingestion (Gate 1)


Avoid:
- Don't skip Gate 1 before plan ingestion—defects cascade silently
- Don't treat skipped gates as failures—they mean input data was optional

task_id.description: Task span ID for gate context

min_coverage.description: Minimum coverage threshold (0.0-1.0). Fails if below.

tools.name: contextcore.pipeline.diagnose
tools.description:
Run Three Questions diagnostic across export, ingestion, and execution layers (Gate 2)


Avoid:
- Don't fix Q2/Q3 issues while Q1 is failing—always start from the source
- Don't confuse 'skipped' (missing input data) with 'not_reached' (prior question failed)

tools.name: contextcore.docs.index
tools.description:
Generate programmatic documentation index from capability evidence and directory scan


Avoid:
- Don't hand-edit contextcore.docs.yaml—it is overwritten on every regeneration
- Don't treat orphaned docs as 'bad'—they may be valid docs not yet linked to capabilities

no_git.description: Skip git freshness lookup for faster generation

dry_run.description: Print to stdout without writing file

tools.name: contextcore.docs.show
tools.description: Query the documentation index with type, capability, freshness, and cross-reference filters

capability.description: Filter docs governing a specific capability ID

refs_for.description: Show cross-reference graph for a document path

stale_days.description: Show documents not modified in N days

outputSchema.description: Filtered document entries or summary statistics

tools.name: contextcore.docs.audit
tools.description:
Audit documentation gaps by scoring capability importance and detecting missing doc types


Avoid:
- Don't treat all gaps as equal—importance scoring exists for a reason
- Don't create docs for low-importance draft capabilities—wait until maturity increases

min_importance.description: Only report gaps above this importance threshold (0.0-1.0)

type.description: Filter to show only gaps of a specific doc type

verbose.description: Show per-capability detail within cluster summaries

tools.name: contextcore.docs.curate
tools.description:
Curate persona-specific documentation catalogs with onboarding/operations classification and gap detection


Avoid:
- Don't assume all docs are equally relevant to all personas—use the relevance score
- Don't create persona-specific docs that merely duplicate existing general docs—add persona-specific context

persona.description: Filter to a single persona (e.g., operator, developer)

category.description: Show only onboarding or operations documents

gaps_only.description: Only show documentation gaps, not full catalog

tools.name: contextcore.manifest.export_onboarding
tools.description:
Emit programmatic onboarding metadata for plan ingestion and artisan seed enrichment


Avoid:
- Don't hand-edit onboarding-metadata.json—re-export instead, as checksums will break
- Don't skip onboarding metadata for plan ingestion—ASSESS phase needs parameter schemas and coverage gaps

artifact_manifest_path.description: Relative path to artifact manifest file

project_context_path.description: Relative path to project context CRD file

artifact_task_mapping.description: Optional artifact_id → plan task ID mapping

artifact_types.description: Per-type schemas with parameter_keys, parameter_sources, output conventions, example snippets

coverage.description: Overall coverage percentage, gaps list, by-type breakdown

semantic_conventions.description: Metric names, label conventions for dashboard/rule generation

artifact_task_mapping.description: artifact_id → plan task ID mapping for traceability

tools.name: contextcore.aos.message_emit
tools.description: [DEVELOPMENT - not yet implemented] Emit AOS-compliant steps/message events for agent communication

tools.name: contextcore.aos.decision_emit
tools.description: [DEVELOPMENT - not yet implemented] Emit AOS-compliant guardian decisions with Allow/Deny/Modify outcomes

modified_request.description: Required when outcome=modify; the altered request

tools.name: contextcore.aos.trigger_emit
tools.description: [DEVELOPMENT - not yet implemented] Emit AOS-compliant steps/agentTrigger events for autonomous activations

source.description: Source identifier (webhook URL, cron expression, etc.)

tools.name: contextcore.aos.mcp_emit
tools.description: [DEVELOPMENT - not yet implemented] Emit AOS-compliant protocols/MCP events for Model Context Protocol interactions

tools.name: contextcore.aos.validate
tools.description: [DEVELOPMENT - not yet implemented] Validate trace data against AOS schema and report compliance gaps

tools.name: contextcore.contract.propagation
tools.description: Declare end-to-end field flow contracts, validate at phase boundaries, track provenance

tools.name: contextcore.contract.schema_compat
tools.description: Cross-service schema compatibility checking with field mapping and value translation

tools.name: contextcore.contract.semantic_convention
tools.description: Attribute naming and enum consistency enforcement across services

tools.name: contextcore.contract.causal_ordering
tools.description: Cross-boundary event ordering contracts with timestamp verification

tools.name: contextcore.contract.capability_propagation
tools.description: End-to-end permission and capability flow verification through call chains

tools.name: contextcore.contract.slo_budget
tools.description: Per-hop latency budget allocation, tracking, and DEGRADED/BROKEN signaling

tools.name: contextcore.contract.data_lineage
tools.description: Transformation history verification and data provenance tracking

tools.name: contextcore.a2a.contract.task_span
tools.description: Typed contract for task span interchange — validates SpanState v2 compliance, required attributes, and enum values

tools.name: contextcore.a2a.contract.handoff
tools.description: Typed contract for agent-to-agent handoff — validates ExpectedOutput, lifecycle status, and provenance chain

tools.name: contextcore.a2a.contract.artifact_intent
tools.description: Typed declaration of expected artifacts with semantic roles — the Mottainai principle

tools.name: contextcore.a2a.contract.gate_result
tools.description: Typed result from governance gates — pass/fail/warning with structured diagnostics

tools.name: contextcore.a2a.gate.pipeline_integrity
tools.description: Gate 1: 6 structural integrity checks on exported pipeline artifacts

tools.name: contextcore.a2a.gate.diagnostic
tools.description: Gate 2: Three Questions diagnostic — Was anything lost? Does the shape match? Can we trace the lineage?

tools.name: contextcore.pipeline.typed_handoff
tools.description: Use A2A typed primitives (Part, ExpectedOutput) for intra-pipeline stage communication

tools.name: contextcore.contract.expected_output
tools.description: Define typed output contracts with required fields, size limits, and completeness markers

tools.name: contextcore.discovery.well_known
tools.description: Serve A2A Agent Card and ContextCore extended discovery at standard well-known endpoints

tools.name: contextcore.capability_index.build
tools.description: Build/update the capability index from source code scanning and sidecar merging

tools.name: contextcore.capability_index.validate
tools.description: Validate capability index against schema and REQ-CID acceptance criteria

tools.name: contextcore.capability_index.extract
tools.description: Extract raw capabilities from a project via AST-based source code analysis

tools.name: contextcore.capability_index.generate_mcp
tools.description: Generate MCP tool definitions from a capability manifest

tools.name: contextcore.capability_index.generate_a2a
tools.description: Generate A2A Agent Card from a capability manifest for agent-to-agent discovery

tools.name: contextcore.capability_index.query
tools.description: Query capabilities from a manifest with category, maturity, audience, and trigger filters
